body: These are leggings made of heavy quilted cloth. When worn alone, or with only other quilted cloth pieces, you gain DR 3/— against ranged piercing weapons.
name: Quilted Cloth Leg Armor Piece
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Legs/Quilted Cloth Leg Armor Piece
